nodes.text: A magnet was a type of device that attracted things to itself, including some metals, such as iron. Magnets could be used to seal things, such as doors.
An electromagnet was a type of magnet in which the magnetic field was produced by the flow of electric current.
Logray once compared a magnet's powers to Shadowroot soap's tendency to attract flies.
QT-KT possessed a remote-controlled magnet to deal with several floating bombs.
